subject: Pedal mechanical adjustment
description_text:

but I can't find any resources to help. I don't know the differences in the

conversations.body_text: 你好，Hayden Cherry，  您购买的是哪种型号的踏板？我会根据您的具体型号给您发送相应的用户手册。

I got the HE load cell pedals

On Thu, Jun 26, 2025 at 4:34 AM service@simsonn.com

Also, the software I downloaded from the website, 2.0.6 says my pedals are
too old to use

On Thu, Jun 26, 2025 at 12:35 PM Hayden Cherry <hayden@brandedmediaco.com>
wrote:

> I got the HE load cell pedals
>
> On Thu, Jun 26, 2025 at 4:34 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Hayden Cherry,     Please check if there is a button on the control box that can be pressed. If there is, press and hold the button while reconnecting the USB cable to enter recovery mode.  If there’s no button, you can go directly to the firmware update section in Simsonn Manager and manually select the plus.dfu or v1.8.0.sfu file from the pedals folder to perform the update.
